---
title: "Exercise 2"
output: html_document
----
```{r setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)
players <- c("Steph", "Westbrook", "KD", "Kawhi", "AD")
points <- c(25, 40, 30, 34, 45)
FG <- c(63, 34, 55, 50, 75)
nba <- data.frame(players, points, FG)
plot_ly(nba, x = ~points, y = ~FG, type = 'scatter',
       text = ~players, textposition = 'middle right',
        textfont = list(color = '#000000', size = 16)) %>%
  layout(title = 'Points vs FG%',
         xaxis = list(title = 'Points (PTS)',
                      zeroline = TRUE,
                      range = c(0, 100)),
         yaxis = list(title = 'FG% (FG%)',
                      range = c(0,100)))

```
